meanings.sent1: The wild animals displayed nonconditioned behavior in their natural habitat.
meanings.sent2: The child's nonconditioned response to the loud noise showed his instinctual reaction.
meanings.sent3: The nonconditioned reaction of the plant to sunlight made the gardener chuckle.
meanings.sent4: Her nonconditioned fear of spiders was so intense that she couldn't even look at a picture of one.
meanings.sent5: The nonconditioned reflex of blinking when something comes close to the eye is a protective mechanism.

meanings.sent1: The athlete's performance was nonconditioned by external factors, purely based on talent.
meanings.sent2: Her nonconditioned decision to pursue art was driven by her passion and not societal expectations.
meanings.sent3: The nonconditioned taste of the dish surprised the chef, who had never tried such a unique combination before.
meanings.sent4: His nonconditioned belief in honesty was unwavering, regardless of the circumstances.
meanings.sent5: The nonconditioned loyalty of the dog to its owner was heartwarming and genuine.

meanings.sent1: The nonconditioned room felt cold and empty, lacking any personal touches.
meanings.sent2: Her nonconditioned hair flowed freely, untouched by any styling products.
meanings.sent3: The nonconditioned paper crumpled easily, showing its lack of reinforcement.
meanings.sent4: His nonconditioned response was unexpected, as he usually followed a set pattern of behavior.
meanings.sent5: The nonconditioned fabric was soft and natural, without any artificial treatments.
